title: Art Institute of Chicago Red Mosaic Foldable Tote
description:
Foldable Tote developed from the Art Institute Logo designed by Abbot Miller, partner of Pentagram, 2009.

Designed and developed exclusively for the Art Institute of Chicago, our brightly colored mosaic tote is reversible with a black lining.  Inspired by our museum logo, this compact tote folds up into a matching sleeve.  It's always handy and ready to use.

Though stacked vertically, the words “Art,” “Institute,” and “Chicago” each have equal weight, reflecting our continued commitment to our collection, our mission as an educational institution, and our deep connection to our city and our community. The current logo was designed in 2009 by Abbot Miller, partner of Pentagram.

  • Dimensions: Open: 24 x 15 in. Folded: 4.5 x 5 in.
  • Material: Polyester
  • Folded Tote has snap closure.
